title: Big Announcement (tm)
author: verias
text:
Firstly, sorry for the late update today, guys. J's been feeling the pressure and down a little bit lately, so here's hoping he gets to feeling better soon.

As for my big news!

A while back, DaveB, creator/writer/illustrator of Grrl Power posted an open call, looking for a colorist to supplement his work, and take a little of the load off of him while he preps for his Kickstarter as well as other things. I

replies.author: Bizkit*Guest*
replies.text: Congrats on the job!I actually just read through all of Grrl Power's archives a few days ago. I'm loving everything about it so far. Can't wait to see your work there.

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text:
Good work then. I read that page a bit before I checked here and it looked good.

Always funny to see how the webcomics you read get connected.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text:
Ahhh, I was wondering why Dabbler's purple was familiar to a certain cyber-fairy. Congrats Kieth.

And J, I have one thing to say to you...Do NOT overstress yourself to the point of getting sick!!! Dr. Adamas prescribes a hot soak with 1/4 teaspoon of Dragon's Blood oil in the water.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Congrats on the new job Keith!

And get well soon J
